replies.body: No it's not as every map has a different loadout so it's impossible to actually set it up unless something is added where you have the ability to edit a loadout on a single map and do that for every map until every map has the loadout you want.

replies.body:
If the developers could be more efficient at their work, then it would be pretty simple to code:

- Make a container (Chest) that you have the option to open. 
- There will be the loadout, and you can decide on what goes where.
- Hit "save" or whatever, and save the players inventory into a config file.

This shouldn't be too hard. It's really just time consuming if anything.
